metadata.description: Curated collection of specialized agent plugins for Claude Code

plugins.name: doc-maintainer
plugins.description: Specialized agent for documentation auditing and maintenance. Supports audit mode (read-only + report file) and active maintenance modes. Manages CLAUDE.md governance section.

plugins.name: doc-pr-reviewer
plugins.description: Reviews Pull Requests for documentation compliance. Supports advisory, strict, and auto-fix modes. Companion to doc-maintainer.
